remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在於集合中傳回。If the exists in the collection, it is returned. 如果不存在於集合中，針對給定，執行下列動作：If the does not exist in the collection, for a given , the following actions occur: |MissingMappingActionMissingMappingAction|採取的動作Action Taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|建立指定之來源的資料行名稱與來源資料行名稱和資料行名稱。Creates a with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the column name. 這不會加入至集合。This is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|如果缺少指定的資料行對應，則會產生 。An is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|取得 null 值。Gets a null value.| ## Examples 下列範例會搜尋集合內的指定的來源資料行名稱。The following example searches for a with the given source column name within the collection. 如果物件存在，它會傳回。If the object exists, it is returned. 此範例假設集合和已建立物件。The example assumes that a collection and a object have been created.
